dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, containing 1000 hours of book reading utterances derived from the LibriVox project. It includes clean and noisy subsets for evaluation.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech
